mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, A.* from (select ezen_reply.*, ezen_member.grade from ezen_reply, ezen_member where ezen_reply.id = ezen_member.id order by re_step asc)A) where article_num = #{article_num}
mapper.insert: insert into ezen_reply values (ezen_reply_seq.nextval, #{article_num}, #{re_step}, #{re_level}, #{parent_num}, #{id}, #{content}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_char(sysdate,'hh24:mi'))
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, A.* from (select ezen_reply.*, anonymous_board.randomId from ezen_reply, anonymous_board where ezen_reply.id = anonymous_board.id and ezen_reply.article_num = anonymous_board.article_num order by re_step asc)A) where article_num = #{article_num}
